presentationColumns.name: # of Opportunity Activities
presentationColumns.description: The total Activities associated to Opportunities
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - CX - Opportunity Activity.# of Opportunity Activities

presentationColumns.name: # of Open Opportunity Activities
presentationColumns.description: The total Open Activities associated to Opportunities (Activity Status not equal to Complete/Cancelled)
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - CX - Opportunity Activity.# of Open Opportunity Activities

presentationColumns.name: # of Completed Opportunity Activities
presentationColumns.description: The total Completed Activities associated Opportunities (Activity Status = Complete)
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - CX - Opportunity Activity.# of Completed Opportunity Activities

presentationColumns.name: # of Expired Opportunity Activities
presentationColumns.description: The total Expired Activities associated to Opportunities (Activity Status not equal to Complete/Cancelled and Current Date greater than Activity Due Date)
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - CX - Opportunity Activity.# of Expired Opportunity Activities

presentationColumns.name: # of Opportunity Tasks
presentationColumns.description: The total Tasks associated to Opportunities (Activity function = Task)
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - CX - Opportunity Activity.# of Opportunity Tasks

presentationColumns.name: # of Opportunity Appointments
presentationColumns.description: The total Tasks associated to Appointments (Activity function = Appointments)
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - CX - Opportunity Activity.# of Opportunity Appointments

presentationColumns.name: # of Opportunity Call Reports
presentationColumns.description: The total Tasks associated to Call Reports (Activity function = Call Reports)
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - CX - Opportunity Activity.# of Opportunity Call Reports

presentationColumns.name: Average Activity Duration For Open Activities
presentationColumns.description: The average time of an activity. This metric is computed as follows: Activity duration for Activities not in Cancelled or Complete status/# of Activities not in Cancelled or Complete status
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - CX - Opportunity Activity.Average Activity Duration For Open Activities

localization.localizationKey: Average Activity Duration For Open Activities

presentationColumns.name: Average Activity Duration For Completed Activities
presentationColumns.description: The average time taken to complete an activity. This metric is computed as follows: Activity duration for completed activity/# of Completed Activities
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - CX - Opportunity Activity.Average Activity Duration For Completed Activities

localization.localizationKey: Average Activity Duration For Completed Activities

presentationColumns.name: Activity Rate - Opportunities
